services.name: Auto Body Shop

services.name: Deluxe Wash
services.shortDescription: Best in and out hand car wash in Chicago, without waiting in line
services.longDescription: ✔Soft cloth exterior wash ✔All carpets, seats, and trunk vacuumed ✔Interior, dash and console wiped down ✔Tire dressing and microfiber drying are included

services.name: Ozone Disinfection
services.shortDescription: Disinfect your car with ozone - it destroys mold, bacteria, viruses & odors
services.longDescription: ✔ Ozone is one of the most powerful disinfectants ✔ Quickly and effectively sanitizes passenger vehicles and kills germs  ✔In addition to eliminating bacteria, it also destroys bad odors

services.name: Tire Repair
services.shortDescription: Tire leaking air? No worries: we'll patch, re-seal, and re-balance it
services.longDescription: ✔Is your tire leaking air? ✔We will inspect it, patch or reseal it ✔If non-reparable, we can find an identical new or used ✔Installation and re-balancing is included

services.name: Emission Test
services.shortDescription: With no EPA facilities left in Chicago, pass the test without wasting hours
services.longDescription: ✔With no EPA facilities left in Chicago, we bring your car to one in the nearest suburb ✔Shall the car fail the test – we can take it for diagnostics and repair at the shop

services.name: Battery Jump, Test & Swap
services.shortDescription: Dead battery? We come to you to jump, test or replace the battery
services.longDescription: ✔Concierge will come to you to jump the car ✔We will test the battery and either replace the battery on the spot or take it into the shop to install it

services.name: Problem Diagnostics

services.longDescription: ✔Car acting up, warning light on? ✔We take it to diagnose the problem, update you on the issue and send an estimate ✔If you decide to repair, $70 goes towards its cost

services.name: Synthetic Oil Change

services.name: Multi point Inspection

services.longDescription: ✔Multi-point inspection of fluids, hoses, belts, brakes, cooling system, suspension, HVAC, tires, etc ✔Check engine errors scan, battery test ✔You'll get a full report
